name: Knock a Rock alpha v0.1
description:
Knock a Rock

Is a local multiplayer game with up to 4 players inspired by a Gummy's Life, and Super Smash Bros. The goal is to knock everyone else off of the map, and to not let them knock you off! The last one standing each round wins, and the one with the most points at the end of your play session wins the whole game!

Controls
  • USE A CONTROLLER PLEASE
  • Left Joystick = Move
  • Left Joystick Up/Xbox A, Switch B, PS X = Jump
  • Left Joystick Down = Ground Pound
  • Xbox B, Switch A, PS O = Reset Level
  • Xbox Y, Switch X, PS Triangle = Pause/Exit
  • Bumpers = Change Background/Color
How to Play
  • Pick a Map
  • Knock Each other into the Void
  • Play the same map Again, or Exit and Choose another one
  • You Choose when the Game ends, so Have as Much Fun as you Want!
  • Whenever you finish, the person with the highest points wins!
Features to Come
  • More Maps
  • More Colors/Icons
  • Color/Icon Select Screen
  • First to 20-50 Points GameMode
  • PowerUps
  • Random Maps Option
  • Settings Menu
